Title: 14.2 Loadable Function Reference
Description: Add account to firewall group profile

This function adds an account to a group profile. It
              requires the FIREWALL_ADMIN
              privilege.

It is not necessary to register the account itself with
              the firewall before adding the account to the group.
Press CTRL+C to copy SELECT firewall_group_enlist('g', 'fwuser@localhost');
